page.title: 18Homes in Barnt Green
page.content: The overwhelming majority of people in the villages of Barnt Green, Cofton Hackett and Hopwood live in owner occupied homes. There has not been a major house building programme in the area for a long time. There are a few new houses and bungalows built on small individual plots and these are more expensive to buy than similar dwellings in surrounding areas. As the houses in the area tend to be quite old, there is usually a large garden and these make them ideal for families with children.
